title: IntelliLever Product Settings

fields.label: Hero Section
fields.name: lever_hero_section
fields.instructions: Configure the hero section at the top of the page

sub_fields.label: Product Subtitle
sub_fields.name: product_subtitle
sub_fields.default_value: Effortless smart access for interior doors

sub_fields.label: Product Introduction
sub_fields.name: product_intro
sub_fields.default_value: No deadbolt? No problem. IntelliLever replaces almost any lever or knob set, turning back‑of‑house, staff, and guest‑room doors into fully connected entry points—without breaking the bank or the drywall.

fields.label: Benefits Section
fields.name: lever_benefits_section
fields.instructions: Configure the 'Why properties choose IntelliLever' section

sub_fields.label: Benefit Icon (SVG)
sub_fields.name: benefit_icon
sub_fields.instructions: Enter SVG code for the icon (24x24 viewBox recommended)
sub_fields.default_value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><circle cx="12" cy="12" r="10"></circle><polyline points="12 6 12 12 16 14"></polyline></svg>

sub_fields.label: Feature Text
sub_fields.name: feature_text
sub_fields.placeholder: e.g., 'Custom 4‑ to 9‑digit PINs for tailored security levels'

sub_fields.label: Introduction Text
sub_fields.name: standard_intro
sub_fields.default_value: The IntelliLever is designed to fit almost any standard interior door configuration:

sub_fields.label: Conclusion Text
sub_fields.name: standard_conclusion
sub_fields.default_value: IntelliLever features a split-spindle design that works with the vast majority of interior doors, making it an ideal retrofit for staff areas, closets, and secondary entrances.

sub_fields.label: Introduction Text
sub_fields.name: specialty_intro
sub_fields.default_value: IntelliLever can also work with these specialty door types with the right preparation:

sub_fields.label: Tip Text
sub_fields.name: specialty_tip
sub_fields.default_value: For specialty door installations, we recommend consulting with our support team to ensure proper fit and function before ordering.

sub_fields.label: Introduction Text
sub_fields.name: not_compatible_intro
sub_fields.default_value: The IntelliLever is not ideal for these applications:

sub_fields.label: Tip Text
sub_fields.name: not_compatible_tip
sub_fields.default_value: Not sure if IntelliLever is right for your door? Send us photos of your existing hardware and we'll recommend the best 33Lock solution for your needs.

sub_fields.label: Pro Tip (optional)
sub_fields.name: step_tip
sub_fields.instructions: Optional tip to show below the step

fields.label: FAQ Section
fields.name: lever_faq_section
fields.instructions: Configure the frequently asked questions section

sub_fields.label: Use Case Text
sub_fields.name: use_case_text
sub_fields.placeholder: e.g., 'Staff doors & maintenance closets with access logging'

sub_fields.label: CTA Text
sub_fields.name: cta_text
sub_fields.default_value: Book a 10‑minute demo to see IntelliLever in action or request a volume quote today.

sub_fields.label: CTA Supplement Text
sub_fields.name: cta_supplement
sub_fields.default_value: Pair IntelliLever with IntelliMortise for suite entrances and enjoy a unified, cost‑effective smart‑access ecosystem.

description: Advanced Custom Fields for the IntelliLever product page
